description:
Thanks again to AMD for sponsoring this series! Check out their latest offerings at https://lmg.gg/8cMXQ

Enter for a chance to win a Steam Deck OLEDs: https://lmg.gg/r5zS8

What do you get when Linus meets someone even more introvert? You get the most awkward AMD Upgrade to date! We upgrade a Printer, a sewing machine, 2 computers, a smart lock and Steam Deck! Which you can win in our Giveaway!

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1572035-the-most-awkward-upgrade%E2%80%A6-amd-5000-ultimate-tech-upgrade/

Check Out the Products from Matthew's Ultimate Upgrade! Thanks AMD!

https://lmg.gg/amdmatthewl

title: The Most Awkward Upgrade…. AMD $5000 Ultimate Tech Upgrade
